inconsistencies.message: The weather indicated partial cloud and rain, while the activity planned was outdoor without clear alternatives mentioned.
inconsistencies.suggestion: Include alternative indoor activities in case of rain or adjust outdoor timings

inconsistencies.message: The budget is not specified, which is critical for planning.
inconsistencies.suggestion: Define a specific budget for the trip based on categories such as accommodation, dining, and activities

inconsistencies.message: The travel time from Fushimi Inari-taisha to Tofuku-ji is overly optimistic given the average public transport connections.
inconsistencies.suggestion: Adjust the travel time to at least 40 minutes

missing_elements.description: Estimated budget for the trip is not defined.
missing_elements.suggestion: Specify a total trip budget to enhance planning accuracy.

recommendations.rationale: Without a defined budget, it's difficult to ensure expenses are kept within limits and to make the most of the budget.
Accurate travel times ensure a more relaxed itinerary and prevent missed activities.

recommendations.action: Include alternative activities in case of bad weather
recommendations.rationale: This improves flexibility and overall experience in case of adverse weather conditions.
